titleStmt.title: The secrets of government and misteries of state plainly laid open, in all the several forms of government in the Christian world / published by John Milton, Esq.
Cabinet-council
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
Milton, John, 1608-1674.

notesStmt.note: Written by Walter Raleigh. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
First published in 1658 as: The cabinet-council: containing the cheif arts of empire, and mysteries of state.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
